com.ephesoft.dcma.lucene

Class LuceneEngine

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ephesoft.dcma.lucene.LuceneEngine
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ICommonConstants

    @Component
public class LuceneEngine
extends java.lang.Object
implements ICommonConstants
    This class generate the confidence score by using Lucene search engine.It first creates the indexes for a well defined set of input HOCR files and then finds first a maximum of 5 similar documents in the standard indexed set based on confidence score. It stores the first in page level field and others as alternate values inside batch xml.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Ephesoft
    See Also:
    ICommonConstants

      • generateConfidence

        public void generateConfidence(java.lang.String batchInstanceID)
                        throws DCMAApplicationException
        This method generates the confidence score for each HOCR file read from batch xml and stores maximum of 5 best fir pages inbatch xml. For comparison it refers to the already created indexes of standard HOCR pages stored in hierarchy : batch class > document type > page type.
        Parameters:
        batchInstanceID - String
        Throws:
        DCMAApplicationException
        DCMABusinessException

      • updateBatchXML

        public void updateBatchXML(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,ImageDetails> batchDocNameScore,
                  java.util.List<Document> xmlDocuments,
                  java.lang.String eachHtmlPage,
                  java.util.List<PageType> allPageTypes,
                  float firstPageConfWeightage,
                  float middlePageConfWeightage,
                  float lastPageConfWeightage)
                    throws DCMAApplicationException
        This method updates the batch xml for each HOCR file and stores the confidence and value at page level field. The maximum value is stored at page level field and values for all the page types including maximum value are stored as alternate values.
        Parameters:
        batchDocNameScore - Map
        batch - Batch
        eachHtmlPage - String
        allPageTypes - List
        lastPageConfWeightage - confidence score weightage of last page
        middlePageConfWeightage - confidence score weightage of middle page
        firstPageConfWeightage - confidence score weightage of first page
        Throws:
        DCMAApplicationException

      • learnSampleHOCRFilesUsingSelectedPlugin

        public void learnSampleHOCRFilesUsingSelectedPlugin(java.lang.String batchClassIdentifier,
                                           boolean createIndex)
                                             throws DCMAApplicationException,
                                                    java.io.IOException
        Performs learning for a batch class using the plugin selected for ocr'ing in the batch class configuration
        Parameters:
        batchClassID - BatchClassID the batch class id
        createIndex - specifies wheteher to create lucene indexes or not
        Throws:
        DCMAApplicationException - if an error occurs while creating the hocr file
        java.io.IOException - if an error occurs while creating the hocr file
